explanation: [0-0] In a lush green meadow, a white car is parked on the grass. The camera shoots from below the car body, showing the car chassis and a nail stuck in the grass.
[0-5] Next, the car tire can be seen driving forward, gradually revealing the tire tread and hub. Then the tire runs over the nail, and afterward, the tire appears deflated.

[5-7] The scene immediately switches to a hand holding a black mobile phone. On the left, there is a tire lying flat on the ground, and on the right, an upright tire. Then, the person puts the phone in their right hand on the tire on the left. The phone screen displays the timer "00:00:00". Subsequently, the person presses the start button of the timer with their left hand. Some repair tools can be seen placed on the grass.
